001package Ch21_GeometricOperations;
002
003import java.awt.Component;
004import java.awt.event.InputEvent;
005import java.awt.event.KeyAdapter;
006import java.awt.event.KeyEvent;
007import java.awt.event.KeyListener;
008import java.awt.event.MouseAdapter;
009import java.awt.event.MouseEvent;
010import java.awt.event.MouseListener;
011import java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener;
012import java.awt.event.WindowAdapter;
013import java.awt.event.WindowEvent;
014import java.awt.geom.Ellipse2D;
015import java.awt.geom.Path2D;
016
017import ij.IJ;
018import ij.ImagePlus;
019import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
020import ij.gui.ImageCanvas;
021import ij.gui.ImageWindow;
022import ij.gui.Overlay;
023import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
024import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
025import imagingbook.common.color.sets.BasicAwtColor;
026import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
027import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d.PntInt;
028import imagingbook.common.geometry.mappings.linear.AffineMapping2D;
029import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils;
030import imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils;
031import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ColoredStroke;
032import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ShapeOverlayAdapter;
033import imagingbook.core.resource.ImageResource;
034import imagingbook.sampleimages.GeneralSampleImage;
035
036/**
037 * <p>
038 * ImageJ plugin, performs piecewise affine transformation by triangulation of
039 * the input image, as described in Sec. 21.1.8 (see Fig. 21.13) of [1].
040 * </p>
041 * <p>
042 * The plugin projects a triangular grid onto the image which is mouse-editable,
043 * i.e., grid points can be selected and dragged. Note that the outer grid
044 * points (along the image border) cannot be moved. The grid is drawn as a
045 * graphic overlay. In each repaint iteration, pixel values are re-calculated by
046 * </p>
047 * <ol>
048 * <li>finding the containing (distorted) triangle of the pixel,</li>
049 * <li>calculating the affine mapping w.r.t. the original (undistorted)
050 * triangle,</li>
051 * <li>apply target-to-source mapping of pixel coordinates to the original (source) image
052 * and</li>
053 * <li>retrieving the interpolated pixel values from the original image.</li>
054 * </ol>
055 * <p>
056 * The following mouse and keypoint events are observed:
057 * </p>
058 * <ul>
059 * <li>left mouse botton: select and drag grid points,</li>
060 * <li>right mouse botton: reset the grid,</li>
061 * <li>ctrl/+ key: zoom in,</li>
062 * <li>ctrl/- key; zoom out,</li>
063 * <li>enter or escape key: finish editing.</li>
064 * </ul>
065 * <p>
066 * Note that this is a simplistic implementation which leaves much room for improvements
067 * and increased efficiency.
068 * </p>
069 * <p>
070 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An
071 * Algorithmic Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer (2022).
072 * </p>
073 * 
074 * @author WB
075 * @version 2022/11/25
076 */
077public class Mesh_Warp_Interactive implements PlugInFilter {
078
079        private static ImageResource SampleImage = GeneralSampleImage.WartburgSmall_jpg;
080        private static final String PropertyKey = Mesh_Warp_Interactive.class.getName();
081        private static final String EditString = " (editing)";
082        
083        private static int Rows = 10;   // number of grid rows
084        private static int Cols = 10;   // number of grid columns
085        
086        private static BasicAwtColor StrokeColorChoice = BasicAwtColor.Blue;
087        private static BasicAwtColor HighlightColorChoice = BasicAwtColor.Green;
088        
089        private static double StrokeWidth = 0.25;
090        private static double CatchRadius = 3.0;
091        private static boolean ShowTriangles = true;
092        private static boolean HighlightSelection = true;
093        private static boolean RemoveOverlayWhenDone = true;
094        
095        // event handling variables:
096        private KeyListener[] windowKeyListeners = null;
097        private MouseListener[] canvasMouseListeners = null;
098        private KeyListener[] canvasKeyListeners = null;
099        private MouseMotionListener[] canvasMouseMotionListeners = null;
100        
101        // ---- data structures representing the grid and mesh --------------
102        
103        private Pnt2d[][] gridOrig;                             // grid points positions
104        private Pnt2d[][] gridWarped;                   // gridWarped[row][col][x/y]
105        private PntInt nodeSelected = null;             // the selected grid node (x = row, y = column), inner node only!
106        
107        // triangles:
108        private Triangle[][][] trianglesOrig;
109        private Triangle[][][] trianglesWarped;         // trianglesWarped[row][col][0/1]
110        private TriangleGroup trianglesSelected = null;
111
112        // ------------------------------------------------------------------
113        
114        private ImageWindow win;
115        private ImageCanvas canvas;
116        private ImagePlus im;
117        private ImageProcessor ipOrig = null;
118        private String title;   
119        
120        /**
121         * Constructor, asks to open a predefined sample image if no other image
122         * is currently open.
123         */
124        public Mesh_Warp_Interactive() {
125                if (IjUtils.noCurrentImage()) {
126                        DialogUtils.askForSampleImage(SampleImage);
127                }
128        }
129
130        @Override
131        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
132                this.im = im;
133                return DOES_ALL;
134        }
135
136        @Override
137        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
138                if (im.getProperty(PropertyKey) != null) {
139                        IJ.error("Plugin is already running, finish first!");
140                        return;
141                }
142                
143                if (!runDialog()) {
144                        return;
145                }
146                
147                this.win = this.im.getWindow();
148                this.canvas = this.win.getCanvas();
149                this.title = this.im.getTitle();
150                
151                ipOrig = ip.duplicate();        // keep a copy of the original image
152                ipOrig.setInterpolate(true);
153                ipOrig.setInterpolationMethod(ImageProcessor.BICUBIC);
154                
155                im.setProperty(PropertyKey, "running");
156                im.setTitle(title + EditString);
157                setupListeners();
158                
159                reset();
160                redraw();
161                IJ.wait(100);
162        }
163        
164        // ---------------------------------------------------------------
165        
166        private void reset() {
167                initGridAndTriangles(im.getWidth(), im.getHeight());
168                nodeSelected = null;
169                trianglesSelected = null;
170        }
171        
172        private void finish() {
173                revertListeners();
174                im.setTitle(title);
175                nodeSelected = null;
176                trianglesSelected = null;
177                if (RemoveOverlayWhenDone) {
178                        im.setOverlay(null);
179                }
180                ipOrig = null;
181                im.setProperty(PropertyKey, null);
182                im.updateAndDraw();
183        }
184        
185        // ---------------------------------------------------------------
186        
187        private void redraw() {
188                im.setOverlay(makeGridOverlay(gridWarped));
189                im.updateAndDraw();
190        }
191        
192        private void initGridAndTriangles(int w, int h) {
193                this.gridOrig = new Pnt2d[Rows][Cols];
194                this.gridWarped = new Pnt2d[Rows][Cols];
195                
196                // insert equally spaced points over image width/height
197                for (int r = 0; r < Rows; r++) {
198                        double y = (double) r * (h - 1) / (Rows - 1);
199                        for (int c = 0; c < Cols; c++) {
200                                double x = (double) c * (w - 1) / (Cols - 1);
201                                gridOrig[r][c] = gridWarped[r][c] = Pnt2d.from(x, y);
202                        }
203                }
204                
205                trianglesOrig = new Triangle[Rows - 1][Cols - 1][2];
206                trianglesWarped = new Triangle[Rows - 1][Cols - 1][2];
207                updateTrianglesAll(trianglesOrig, gridOrig);
208                updateTrianglesAll(trianglesWarped, gridWarped);
209        }
210        
211        private Overlay makeGridOverlay(Pnt2d[][] pnts) {
212                ShapeOverlayAdapter ola = new ShapeOverlayAdapter();
213                ColoredStroke pathstroke = new ColoredStroke(StrokeWidth, StrokeColorChoice.getColor());
214                ColoredStroke polystroke = new ColoredStroke(StrokeWidth, HighlightColorChoice.getColor());
215                ColoredStroke highlightstroke = 
216                                new ColoredStroke(StrokeWidth, HighlightColorChoice.getColor(), HighlightColorChoice.getColor());
217                
218                // draw the complete grid
219                Path2D.Double gridPath = new Path2D.Double();
220                
221                // draw horizontal grid lines
222                for (int r = 0; r < pnts.length; r++) {
223                        gridPath.moveTo(pnts[r][0].getX(), pnts[r][0].getY());
224                        for (int c = 1; c < pnts[r].length; c++) {
225                                gridPath.lineTo(pnts[r][c].getX(), pnts[r][c].getY());
226                        }
227                }               
228                // draw vertical grid lines
229                for (int r = 0; r < pnts[0].length; r++) {
230                        gridPath.moveTo(pnts[0][r].getX(), pnts[0][r].getY());
231                        for (int c = 1; c < pnts.length; c++) {
232                                gridPath.lineTo(pnts[c][r].getX(), pnts[c][r].getY());
233                        }
234                }
235                // draw diagonal grid lines
236                if (ShowTriangles) {
237                        for (int r = 0; r < pnts.length - 1; r++) {
238                                for (int c = 0; c < pnts[0].length - 1; c++) {
239                                        gridPath.moveTo(pnts[r][c].getX(), pnts[r][c].getY());
240                                        gridPath.lineTo(pnts[r + 1][c + 1].getX(), pnts[r + 1][c + 1].getY());
241                                }
242                        }
243                }       
244                ola.addShape(gridPath, pathstroke);
245                
246                // draw the vertices
247                double rad = CatchRadius;
248                for (int r = 0; r < pnts.length; r++) {
249                        for (int c = 0; c < pnts[r].length; c++) {
250                                double x = pnts[r][c].getX();
251                                double y = pnts[r][c].getY();
252                                Ellipse2D.Double circle = new Ellipse2D.Double(x - rad, y - rad, 2 * rad, 2 * rad);
253                                ola.addShape(circle, polystroke);
254                        }
255                                }
256                
257                // mark the selected grid point
258                if (nodeSelected != null && HighlightSelection) {       
259                        Pnt2d ps = gridWarped[nodeSelected.x][nodeSelected.y];
260                        double xs = ps.getX();
261                        double ys = ps.getY();
262                        Ellipse2D.Double circle = new Ellipse2D.Double(xs - rad, ys - rad, 2 * rad, 2 * rad);
263                        ola.addShape(circle, highlightstroke);
264                }
265                
266                // mark the enclosing polygon (if exists)
267                if (trianglesSelected != null && HighlightSelection) {
268                        for (Triangle t : trianglesSelected.trgls) {
269                                ola.addShape(t, polystroke);
270                        }
271                }
272                
273                return ola.getOverlay();
274        }
275        
276        // move the currently selected grid point to new position
277        private void moveSelectedGridPoint(int xNew, int yNew) {
278                if (nodeSelected != null) {     //  && (ns.x >= 0) && (ns.x < Rows) && (ns.y >= 0) && (ns.y < Cols)
279                        gridWarped[nodeSelected.x][nodeSelected.y] = Pnt2d.from(xNew, yNew);
280                }
281        }
282        
283        private PntInt findGridPoint(PntInt xyClick) {
284                // only inner grid points may be selected, not the ones at the border!
285                for (int r = 1; r < gridWarped.length - 1; r++) {
286                        for (int c = 1; c < gridWarped[r].length - 1; c++) {
287                                double dist = xyClick.distance(gridWarped[r][c]);
288                                if (dist <= CatchRadius) {
289                                        return PntInt.from(r, c);
290                                }
291                        }
292                }
293                return null;
294        }
295        
296        private void updateGridSelection(PntInt xy) {
297                nodeSelected = findGridPoint(xy);
298                trianglesSelected = (nodeSelected == null) ? null : new TriangleGroup(nodeSelected);
299        }
300
301        // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
302        
303        private void remapImage() {
304                updateTrianglesAll(trianglesWarped, gridWarped);
305                updateTrianglesSelected();
306                updateAffineMappings();
307                warpImage();
308        }
309        
310        private void warpImage() {
311                ImageProcessor ip = im.getProcessor();  
312                int width = ip.getWidth();
313                int height = ip.getHeight();
314                
315                // iterate over all pixels:
316                for (int u = 0; u < width; u++) {
317                        for (int v = 0; v < height; v++) {
318                                Triangle tWarp = null;
319                                
320                                // if there is a selection we only remap pixels inside
321                                if (trianglesSelected != null) {
322                                        tWarp = trianglesSelected.findTriangle(u, v);           // search only over enclosing polygon triangles
323                                        if (tWarp == null)
324                                                continue;       
325                                }
326                                
327                                // otherwise (if no selection), we remap all pixels
328                                else {
329                                        tWarp = findEnclosingGridTriangle(u, v);                                
330                                }
331
332                                // if enclosing triangle was found, remap pixel (u,v)
333                                if (tWarp != null) {                                                    // containing triangle found
334                                        AffineMapping2D am = tWarp.getMapping();
335                                        Pnt2d xy = am.applyTo(PntInt.from(u, v));       // source image position
336                                        int val = ipOrig.getPixelInterpolated(xy.getX(), xy.getY());
337                                        ip.set(u, v, val);
338                                }
339                        }
340                }
341        }
342        
343        private Triangle findEnclosingGridTriangle(double x, double y) {
344                for (int r = 0; r < Rows - 1; r++) {
345                        for (int c = 0; c < Cols - 1; c++) {
346                                for (int i = 0; i < 2; i++) {
347                                        Triangle t = trianglesWarped[r][c][i];
348                                        if (t.contains(x, y)) {
349                                                return t;
350                                        }
351                                }
352                        }
353                }
354                return null;  // no enclosing triangle found
355        }
356        
357        private void updateTrianglesAll(Triangle[][][] theTriangles, Pnt2d[][] theGrid) {
358                for (int r = 0; r < Rows - 1; r++) {
359                        for (int c = 0; c < Cols - 1; c++) {
360                                Pnt2d p0 = theGrid[r][c];
361                                Pnt2d p1 = theGrid[r+1][c];
362                                Pnt2d p2 = theGrid[r+1][c+1];
363                                Pnt2d p3 = theGrid[r][c+1];
364                                theTriangles[r][c][0] = new Triangle(p0, p1, p2, r, c, 0);      // triangle A
365                                theTriangles[r][c][1] = new Triangle(p0, p2, p3, r, c, 1);      // triangle B
366                        }
367                }
368        }
369        
370        private void updateTrianglesSelected() {
371                if (trianglesSelected != null) {
372                        trianglesSelected.updateTriangles();
373                }
374        }
375        
376        private void updateAffineMappings() {
377                for (int r = 0; r < Rows - 1; r++) {
378                        for (int c = 0; c < Cols - 1; c++) {
379                                for (int i = 0; i < 2; i++) {
380                                        Triangle tOrig = trianglesOrig[r][c][i];
381                                        Triangle tWarp = trianglesWarped[r][c][i];
382                                        AffineMapping2D am = getAffineMapping(tWarp, tOrig);
383                                        tWarp.setMapping(am);
384                                }
385                        }
386                }
387        }
388        
389        private AffineMapping2D getAffineMapping(Triangle tP, Triangle tQ) {
390                Pnt2d[] P = {tP.pa, tP.pb, tP.pc};
391                Pnt2d[] Q = {tQ.pa, tQ.pb, tQ.pc};
392                return AffineMapping2D.fromPoints(P, Q);
393        }
394
395        // ------------------------------------------------------------
396        // EVENT HANDLING:
397        // ----------------------------------------------------------------
398        
399        // anonymous sub-class of MouseAdapter
400        private final MouseAdapter MA = new MouseAdapter() {
401                @Override
402                public void mousePressed(MouseEvent e) {
403                        try {           // right mouse button -> reset
404                                if ((e.getModifiersEx() & InputEvent.BUTTON3_DOWN_MASK) != 0) {
405                                        reset();
406                                }
407                                else {  // otherwise update the grid
408                                        updateGridSelection(
409                                                        PntInt.from(canvas.offScreenX(e.getX()), canvas.offScreenY(e.getY())));
410                                }
411                                redraw();       
412                                e.consume();
413                        } catch (Exception ex) {
414                                IJ.handleException(ex);
415                        }
416                }
417
418                @Override
419                public void mouseReleased(MouseEvent e) {
420                        try {
421                                remapImage();
422                                redraw();
423                                if (e.getClickCount() == 2 && !e.isConsumed()) {
424                                        e.consume();
425                                }
426                        } catch (Exception ex) {
427                                IJ.handleException(ex);
428                        }
429                }
430                
431                @Override
432                public void mouseDragged(MouseEvent e) {
433                        try {
434                                int x = canvas.offScreenX(e.getX());
435                                int y = canvas.offScreenY(e.getY());
436                                if ((nodeSelected != null) && (trianglesSelected != null) && (trianglesSelected.contains(x, y))) {
437                                        moveSelectedGridPoint(x, y);
438                                        redraw();
439                                }
440                                } catch (Exception ex) {
441                                        IJ.handleException(ex);
442                        }
443                }
444                
445        };
446        
447        // anonymous sub-class of KeyAdapter
448        private final KeyAdapter KA = new KeyAdapter() {
449                @Override
450                public void keyPressed(KeyEvent e) {
451                        int keyCode = e.getKeyCode();
452                        // escape -> finish
453                        if(keyCode == KeyEvent.VK_ESCAPE || keyCode == KeyEvent.VK_ENTER) {
454                                finish();
455                        }
456                        // ctrl/+ zoom in
457                        else if(keyCode == KeyEvent.VK_PLUS && e.isControlDown()) {
458                                canvas.zoomIn(im.getWidth()/2, im.getHeight()/2);
459                        }
460                        // ctrl/- zoom out
461                        else if(keyCode == KeyEvent.VK_MINUS && e.isControlDown()) {
462                                canvas.zoomOut(im.getWidth()/2, im.getHeight()/2);
463                        }
464                }
465        };
466        
467        private void setupListeners() {
468                // remove current listeners and keep for later re-install
469                windowKeyListeners = removeKeyListeners(win);
470                canvasKeyListeners = removeKeyListeners(canvas);
471                canvasMouseListeners = removeMouseListeners(canvas);
472                canvasMouseMotionListeners = removeMouseMotionListeners(canvas);
473                
474                canvas.addKeyListener(KA);
475                canvas.addMouseListener(MA);
476                canvas.addMouseMotionListener(MA);
477
478                win.addWindowListener(new WindowAdapter() {  
479            @Override
480                        public void windowClosing(WindowEvent e) {  
481                finish();
482            }  
483        });
484                
485                canvas.requestFocus();  // important, otherwise key events have no effect!!
486        }
487        
488        private void revertListeners() {
489                if (win != null) {
490                        // remove this plugin's listener(s)
491                        removeKeyListeners(win);
492                        // install original listener(s)
493                        addKeyListeners(win, windowKeyListeners);
494                }
495
496                if (canvas != null) {
497                        // remove this plugin's listener(s)
498                        removeKeyListeners(canvas);
499                        removeMouseListeners(canvas);
500                        removeMouseMotionListeners(canvas);
501                        // install original listener(s)
502                        addKeyListeners(canvas, canvasKeyListeners);
503                        addMouseListeners(canvas, canvasMouseListeners);
504                        addMouseMotionListeners(canvas, canvasMouseMotionListeners);
505                }
506        }
507        
508        // ------------------------------------------------------
509        
510        private KeyListener[] removeKeyListeners(Component comp) {
511                KeyListener[] listeners = comp.getKeyListeners();
512                for (KeyListener kl : comp.getKeyListeners()) {
513                        comp.removeKeyListener(kl);
514                }
515                return listeners;
516        }
517        
518        private MouseListener[] removeMouseListeners(Component comp) {
519                MouseListener[] listeners = comp.getMouseListeners();
520                for (MouseListener ml : listeners) {
521                        comp.removeMouseListener(ml);
522                }
523                return listeners;
524        }
525        
526        private MouseMotionListener[] removeMouseMotionListeners(Component comp) {
527                MouseMotionListener[] listeners = comp.getMouseMotionListeners();
528                for (MouseMotionListener ml : listeners) {
529                        comp.removeMouseMotionListener(ml);
530                }
531                return listeners;
532        }
533        
534        // ----------------
535        
536        private void addKeyListeners(Component comp, KeyListener[] listeners) {
537                if (comp == null || listeners == null) return;
538                for (KeyListener kl : listeners) {
539                        comp.addKeyListener(kl);
540                }
541        }
542        
543        private void addMouseListeners(Component comp, MouseListener[] listeners) {
544                if (comp == null || listeners == null) return;
545                for (MouseListener ml : listeners) {
546                        comp.addMouseListener(ml);
547                }
548        }
549        
550        private void addMouseMotionListeners(Component comp, MouseMotionListener[] listeners) {
551                if (comp == null || listeners == null) return;
552                for (MouseMotionListener ml : listeners) {
553                        comp.addMouseMotionListener(ml);
554                }
555        }
556        
557        // ------------------------------------------------------------------
558        
559        /**
560         * Represents a 2D triangle, used for point inclusion testing and
561         * affine mapping.
562         * @author WB
563         */
564        @SuppressWarnings("serial")
565        class Triangle extends Path2D.Double {
566                
567                final int row, col, id;
568                final Pnt2d pa, pb, pc;
569                
570                private AffineMapping2D mapping = null;
571                
572                AffineMapping2D getMapping() {
573                        return this.mapping;
574                }
575                
576                void setMapping(AffineMapping2D mapping) {
577                        this.mapping = mapping;
578                }
579                
580                Triangle(Pnt2d pa, Pnt2d pb, Pnt2d pc, int row, int col, int id) {
581                        this.row = row;
582                        this.col = col;
583                        this.id = id;   // = 0,1
584                        this.pa = pa;
585                        this.pb = pb;
586                        this.pc = pc;
587                        // make triangle path:
588                        this.moveTo(pa.getX(), pa.getY());
589                        this.lineTo(pb.getX(), pb.getY());
590                        this.lineTo(pc.getX(), pc.getY());
591                        this.closePath();
592                }
593                
594//              @Override
595//              public String toString() {
596//                      return (String.format("Triangle[row=%d col=%d id=%d", this.row, this.col, this.id));
597//              }
598        }
599        
600        /**
601         * This is the group of triangles associated with a particular grid point.
602         */
603        class TriangleGroup {
604                final int r, c;                                         // the grid point
605                private final Triangle[] trgls;
606                
607                TriangleGroup(PntInt rc) {
608                        this.r = rc.x;
609                        this.c = rc.y;
610                        this.trgls = new Triangle[6];
611                        updateTriangles();
612                }
613
614                private void updateTriangles() {
615                        trgls[0] = trianglesWarped[r-1][c-1][0];
616                        trgls[1] = trianglesWarped[r-1][c-1][1];                
617                        trgls[2] = trianglesWarped[r-1][c][0];
618                        trgls[3] = trianglesWarped[r][c-1][1];                  
619                        trgls[4] = trianglesWarped[r][c][0];
620                        trgls[5] = trianglesWarped[r][c][1];
621                }
622
623                private Triangle findTriangle(double x, double y) {
624                        for (Triangle t : this.trgls) {
625                                if (t.contains(x, y)) {
626                                        return t;
627                                }
628                        }
629                        return null;
630                }       
631
632                private boolean contains(double x, double y) {
633                        return (findTriangle(x, y) != null);
634                }
635        }
636        
637        // -------------------------------------------------------------------
638        
639        private boolean runDialog() {
640                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
641                
642                gd.addMessage(DialogUtils.makeLineSeparatedString(
643                                "How to use:",
644                                "      left mouse: select and drag grid points",
645                                "      right mouse: reset the grid",
646                                "      ctrl/+ key: zoom in\n",
647                                "      ctrl/- key: zoom out\n",
648                                "      enter or escape key: finish editing"));
649                
650                gd.addNumericField("Number of grid rows", Rows, 0);
651                gd.addNumericField("Number of grid columns", Cols, 0);
652                gd.addEnumChoice("Grid stroke color", StrokeColorChoice);
653                gd.addEnumChoice("Point highlight color", HighlightColorChoice);
654                gd.addNumericField("Grid stroke width", StrokeWidth, 1);
655                gd.addNumericField("Catch radius", CatchRadius, 1);
656                gd.addCheckbox("Show grid triangles", ShowTriangles);
657                gd.addCheckbox("Highlight selection", HighlightSelection);
658                gd.addCheckbox("Remove overlay when done", RemoveOverlayWhenDone);
659                
660                gd.showDialog();
661                if (gd.wasCanceled())
662                        return false;
663                
664                Rows = (int) gd.getNextNumber();
665                Cols = (int) gd.getNextNumber();
666                StrokeColorChoice = gd.getNextEnumChoice(BasicAwtColor.class);
667                HighlightColorChoice = gd.getNextEnumChoice(BasicAwtColor.class);
668                StrokeWidth = gd.getNextNumber();
669                CatchRadius = gd.getNextNumber();
670                ShowTriangles = gd.getNextBoolean();
671                HighlightSelection = gd.getNextBoolean();
672                RemoveOverlayWhenDone = gd.getNextBoolean();
673                
674                return true;
675        }
676}
